input: user: A bustling newsroom filled with journalists at desks, the wall clocks showing international times. The bright overhead lights signify urgency and the pulse of daily news.
coverage: A bustling newsroom brims with diligent journalists at densely packed desks, each enlivened by the urgency of their craft. Bright overhead lights cast a stark, unwavering illumination, emphasizing the relentless pulse of breaking news amidst a cacophony of ringing phones. Wall clocks tick in synchronization, displaying international times and connecting this local hub to the global narrative. This scene exudes a thrilling sense of immediacy and the exhilarating chaos that accompanies the quest for the next big story.
